Posts.EditableText: This is the prologue to my first game! Feedback and au ideas very welcome! Thanks! http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... e-prologue YOU, XIO, ARE IN FOR ONE COMPLEX RIDE. OTHER THAN THE FACT THAT YOU WOKE UP WITH NO MEMORIES WHATSOEVER, THERE'S SOME VENGEFUL TEACHER GUY OUT TO GET YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES. WELL, MORE LIKE PUT ALL OF YOU IN A BUNCH OF ALTERNATE DIMENSIONS AND FORCE YOU TO BE SOME KIND OF HERO IN ALL OF THEM FOR HIS ENTERTAINMENT AND YOUR MISERY. AND THIS IS THE PROLOGUE. HOW IT ALL STARTED. IF YOU DECIDE YOU WANNA KNOW HOW IT STARTED... YEAH, GOOD LUCK WITH THAT. COMING SOON IN THE XIO SERIES: XIO I: ??? >:)
Posts.HTML:
This is the prologue to my first game! Feedback and au ideas very welcome! Thanks!
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... e-prologue

YOU, XIO, ARE IN FOR ONE COMPLEX RIDE. OTHER THAN THE FACT THAT YOU WOKE UP WITH NO MEMORIES WHATSOEVER, THERE'S SOME VENGEFUL TEACHER GUY OUT TO GET YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES. WELL, MORE LIKE PUT ALL OF YOU IN A BUNCH OF ALTERNATE DIMENSIONS AND FORCE YOU TO BE SOME KIND OF HERO IN ALL OF THEM FOR HIS ENTERTAINMENT AND YOUR MISERY.

AND THIS IS THE PROLOGUE. HOW IT ALL STARTED.

IF YOU DECIDE YOU WANNA KNOW HOW IT STARTED... YEAH, GOOD LUCK WITH THAT.

COMING SOON IN THE XIO SERIES:
XIO I: ??? >:)
